verses.verse: שִׁגָּי֗וֹן <WH7692> Shiggaion לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <WH1732> of David אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which שָׁ֥ר <WH7891> which he sang לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> and דִּבְרֵי־ <WH1697> concerning the words כ֝֗וּשׁ <WH3568> of Cush בֶּן־ יְמִינִֽי׃ <WH1145> Benjamite יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> O LORD אֱ֭לֹהַי <WH430> my God בְּךָ֣ חָסִ֑יתִי <WH2620> in thee do I put my trust הוֹשִׁיעֵ֥נִי <WH3467> save מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all רֹ֝דְפַ֗י <WH7291> me from all them that persecute וְהַצִּילֵֽנִי׃ <WH5337> me and deliver

פֶּן־ <WH6435> Or יִטְרֹ֣ף <WH2963> Lest he tear כְּאַרְיֵ֣ה <WH738> like a lion נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> my soul פֹּ֝רֵ֗ק <WH6561> rending [it] in pieces וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> there מַצִּֽיל׃ <WH5337> while [there is] none to deliver

יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> O LORD אֱ֭לֹהַי <WH430> my God אִם־ <WH518> if עָשִׂ֣יתִי <WH6213> if I have done זֹ֑את <WH2063> likewise אִֽם־ <WH518> If יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> this if there be עָ֥וֶל <WH5766> iniquity בְּכַפָּֽי׃ <WH3709> in my hands

אִם־ <WH518> If גָּ֭מַלְתִּי <WH1580> If I have rewarded שֽׁוֹלְמִ֥י <WH7999> unto him that was at peace רָ֑ע <WH7451> evil וָאֲחַלְּצָ֖ה <WH2502> with me (yea I have delivered צוֹרְרִ֣י <WH6887> is mine enemy רֵיקָֽם׃ <WH7387> him that without cause

יִֽרַדֹּ֥ף <WH7291> persecute אוֹיֵ֨ב ׀ <WH341> Let the enemy נַפְשִׁ֡י <WH5315> my soul וְיַשֵּׂ֗ג <WH5381> and take וְיִרְמֹ֣ס <WH7429> [it] yea let him tread down לָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> upon the earth חַיָּ֑י <WH2416> my life וּכְבוֹדִ֓י ׀ <WH3519> mine honour לֶעָפָ֖ר <WH6083> in the dust יַשְׁכֵּ֣ן <WH7931> and lay סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah

ק֘וּמָ֤ה <WH6965> Arise יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <WH3068> O LORD בְּאַפֶּ֗ךָ <WH639> in thine anger הִ֭נָּשֵׂא <WH5375> lift up בְּעַבְר֣וֹת <WH5678> thyself because of the rage צוֹרְרָ֑י <WH6887> of mine enemies וְע֥וּרָה <WH5782> and awake אֵ֝לַ֗י <WH410> God מִשְׁפָּ֥ט <WH4941> for me [to] the judgment צִוִּֽיתָ׃ <WH6680> [that] thou hast commanded

וַעֲדַ֣ת <WH5712> So shall the congregation לְ֭אֻמִּים <WH3816> of the people תְּסוֹבְבֶ֑ךָּ <WH5437> compass thee about וְ֝עָלֶ֗יהָ <WH5921> and over לַמָּר֥וֹם <WH4791> thou on high שֽׁוּבָה׃ <WH7725> for their sakes therefore return

יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> The LORD יָדִ֪ין <WH1777> shall judge עַ֫מִּ֥ים <WH5971> the people שָׁפְטֵ֥נִי <WH8199> judge יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> me O LORD כְּצִדְקִ֖י <WH6664> according to my righteousness וּכְתֻמִּ֣י <WH8537> and according to mine integrity עָלָֽי׃ <WH5921> and

יִגְמָר־ <WH1584> come to an end נָ֬א <WH4994> O רַ֨ע ׀ <WH7451> Oh let the wickedness רְשָׁעִים֮ <WH7563> of the wicked וּתְכוֹנֵ֪ן <WH3559> but establish צַ֫דִּ֥יק <WH6662> the just וּבֹחֵ֣ן <WH974> trieth לִ֭בּ֗וֹת <WH3826> the hearts וּכְלָי֗וֹת <WH3629> and reins אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> God צַדִּֽיק׃ <WH6662> for the righteous
מָֽגִנִּ֥י <WH4043> My defence עַל־ <WH5921> is with אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> [is] of God מ֝וֹשִׁ֗יעַ <WH3467> which saveth יִשְׁרֵי־ <WH3477> the upright לֵֽב׃ <WH3820> in heart
אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> God שׁוֹפֵ֣ט <WH8199> judgeth צַדִּ֑יק <WH6662> the righteous וְ֝אֵ֗ל <WH410> and God זֹעֵ֥ם <WH2194> is angry בְּכָל־ <WH3605> every יֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> [with the wicked] every day

אִם־ <WH518> If לֹ֣א <WH3808> does not יָ֭שׁוּב <WH7725> If he turn חַרְבּ֣וֹ <WH2719> his sword יִלְט֑וֹשׁ <WH3913> not he will whet קַשְׁתּ֥וֹ <WH7198> his bow דָ֝רַ֗ךְ <WH1869> he hath bent וַֽיְכוֹנְנֶֽהָ׃ <WH3559> and made it ready

וְ֭לוֹ הֵכִ֣ין <WH3559> He hath also prepared כְּלֵי־ <WH3627> for him the instruments מָ֑וֶת <WH4194> of death חִ֝צָּ֗יו <WH2671> his arrows לְֽדֹלְקִ֥ים <WH1814> against the persecutors יִפְעָֽל׃ <WH6466> he ordaineth

הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> Behold יְחַבֶּל־ <WH2254> Behold he travaileth אָ֑וֶן <WH205> with iniquity וְהָרָ֥ה <WH2029> and hath conceived עָ֝מָ֗ל <WH5999> mischief וְיָ֣לַד <WH3205> and brought forth שָֽׁקֶר׃ <WH8267> falsehood
בּ֣וֹר <WH953> a pit כָּ֭רָֽה <WH3738> He made וַֽיַּחְפְּרֵ֑הוּ <WH2658> and digged וַ֝יִּפֹּ֗ל <WH5307> it and is fallen בְּשַׁ֣חַת <WH7845> into the ditch יִפְעָֽל׃ <WH6466> [which] he made

יָשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> shall return עֲמָל֣וֹ <WH5999> His mischief בְרֹאשׁ֑וֹ <WH7218> upon his own head וְעַ֥ל <WH5921> upon קָ֝דְקֳד֗וֹ <WH6936> upon his own pate חֲמָס֥וֹ <WH2555> and his violent יֵרֵֽד׃ <WH3381> dealing shall come down

אוֹדֶ֣ה <WH3034> I will praise יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD כְּצִדְק֑וֹ <WH6664> according to his righteousness וַ֝אֲזַמְּרָ֗ה <WH2167> and will sing praise שֵֽׁם־ <WH8034> to the name יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <WH5945> most high
